about_the_game: Lower resolution, lower bit-rate versions of the in-game cutscenes, which should enable smoother playback for certain New 'n' Tasty players. Download the DLC to enable the 720p cut-scenes, and uncheck the DLC to go back to the high bit-rate 1080p versions.
detailed_description: Lower resolution, lower bit-rate versions of the in-game cutscenes, which should enable smoother playback for certain New 'n' Tasty players. Download the DLC to enable the 720p cut-scenes, and uncheck the DLC to go back to the high bit-rate 1080p versions.

short_description: Lower resolution, lower bit-rate versions of the in-game cutscenes for lower-spec PCs.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
